message.entry: First argument must be a table or numeric vector.
The ''{0}'' argument must be a vector.
The ''labels'' argument must be specified as a string vector or cell array of character vectors.
The ''groups'' argument must be specified as a cell array of character vectors, or a vector of strings, categoricals, numerics or logicals.
The length of the ''{0}'' argument must match the length of the ''sz'' argument.
When not using a table, specify labels as strings, a cell array of character vectors, or an array that is convertible to strings.
When not using a table, specify groups as strings, a cell array of character vectors, a categorical, numeric, or logical vector.
Specify bubble size as a vector of non-negative numbers.
{0} is not a valid table variable or property name.
The length of ''{0}'' must match the length of ''{1}''.
Setting the ''{0}'' property after setting the ''SizeData'' property is not supported.
Setting the ''{0}'' property after setting the ''SourceTable'' property is not supported.
